level.heading: DOME LIGHT INSTALLATION BUSINESS – EQUIPMENT MAINTENANCE (§ 31-1511)

level.text: A dome light installation business owner shall properly maintain all equipment required by the Commission, and any other equipment required by law or regulation, in good working order and in such a manner that an inspection or test may be conducted in conformity with these rules.
A dome light installation business shall not conduct any test or installation using equipment that is not in good working order.
